name: The Sacred Land Of Oasis
description:
Hello,This Is My First Game This Game Is 3D And Built Using Unity I Will Be Using Unreal Engine 4 In Later.This Game Is Set In Ancient Egypt.This Game Features Pyramids,Ancients Ruins And Some Water.Your Objective Is To Find The Gold Ingots Lost In The Desert Almost 3000 Years Ago.

Update 1.01=New Statue,Better Optimization Specs Revealed 

Specs To Run The Game Buttery Smooth:

Processor:Core 2 Quad Q6600

Ram=6GB

GPU:GT 730 DDR5 2GB

OS:Windows 10
